titles: A sermon preached at the funeral of Mrs. Mary Alston, wife to Joseph Alston Esq; who dyed, Jan. 25. and was interred at Chelsey, Feb. 7. 1670. By Adam Littleton, D.D. Recton of Chelsey.
author: Littleton, Adam, 1627-1694.
notes: Imperfect, apparently missing one preliminary leaf.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
